item.title: k8s: Kubernetes v1.35: Extended Toleration Operators to Support Numeric Comparisons (Alpha)
item.description: Kubernetes v1.35 introduces Extended Toleration Operators (alpha) that add numeric comparison operators Gt and Lt to spec.tolerations. This lets tolerations compare numeric taint values (e.g., failure-probability, gpu-compute-score, disk-iops, cost-per-hour) so schedulers can make threshold-based placement decisions while preserving taint/toleration semantics (centralized node-side policy and eviction via NoExecute). The feature is gated, supports all taint effects, has specific numeric format rules, and is experimental â€” feedback and further enhancements (CEL, autoscaling integration, graduation) are planned.
